item.title: Resume
item.description: Skillset Languages: Bash, Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Node.js Platforms: Debian, Gentoo, RHEL, CentOS; FreeBSD, OSX; Windows Web Servers: nginx, Apache Database: SolidDB, MySQL, MongoDB Network Tools: tcpdump, nmap, iptables, dnsmasq Cloud: AWS EXPERIENCE Solutions Engineer StrongArm Technologies — 2017 - Present Tested and troubleshot client issues from discovery to resolution Provisioned, managed, and maintained various AWS services to maintain data and web server integrity and uptime Managed updates and data transfer for thousands of network enabled devices remotely through SaltStack Administered user and client accounts for various application services Configured Jira ticketing system to be used by clients for issue tracking and resolution Provisioned, managed, and maintained client accounts Technical Support Engineer III Ericsson, Inc â€” 2013 - 2017

item.title: Yelpcamp
item.description: A simple site to talk about Camp sites. Built with Node.js, Express, Bootstrap, and MongoDB. It has some basic funtionality and I’m working on adding more features.

item.title: About me
item.description: Currently I’m seeking new opportunities in full stack web development and to further my existing skills with Linux systems. I’ve been participating in online courses to better understand full stack development for building websites from the ground up. I decided to move into web development after seven years of providing technical support in client-facing and B2B circumstances. My various support roles have allowed me opportunities to test and upgrade software, support large data centers, administrate user accounts, and plan server implementations in live production environments.
